articles.title: I&N, an IT company specializing in pregnancy, childbirth and childcare, announced on the 2nd tha..
articles.author: Wonho-seop
articles.summary: Baby detergent brand Beaddle is participating in the "2025 Kobe Baby Fair" to promote its premium "Boddy Soft" detergent line. Beaddle offers special sales promotions, including discounted products and giveaways of samples and prizes, to attract customers at the fair.

articles.title: Protein: The latest obsession for consumer-facing brands
articles.author: Nisha Qureshi
articles.summary: Khloe Kardashian launched Khloud Protein Popcorn, a protein-enriched snack. Mother Dairy is planning to expand its ProMilk range with protein-rich curd and paneer. SuperYou, co-founded by Ranveer Singh, offers India's first protein wafer bar. Amul launched Protein kulfi and Super Milk and continues to build its protein portfolio.

articles.title: Starbucks CEO shares plan for a whole new menu
articles.author: Dana Sullivan Kilroy
articles.summary: Starbucks is implementing a new mobile ordering system to reduce the time customers spend waiting for their orders. CEO Brian Niccol promised to decrease the wait time, and the new system seems to be contributing to this goal.

articles.title: Starbucks will open its first 3D store! Where will it be located?
articles.author: Bibiana Palacios
articles.summary: Starbucks is launching a new 3D-printed store in Brownsville, Texas, set to open on May 2nd. This location, constructed by PERI 3D Construction, will offer drive-thru and delivery services, featuring a ribbed wall design.

articles.title: Advertising industry at the cusp of fifth industrial revolution, driven by AI: WPP CEO
articles.author: ET Bureau
articles.summary: WPP is investing in its AI-powered platform, WPP Open, designed to transform marketing. This AI-driven operating system aims to support human creativity, improve efficiency, and help businesses grow faster. The company sees AI as enhancing creativity, changing how work is produced and experienced by consumers.

articles.title: Starbucks opens first 3D printed store in U.S.
articles.author: Finance
articles.summary: Starbucks has introduced its first 3D printed store in the U.S. This signifies a new and innovative service approach by the company.

articles.title: BYD's Five-Minute Fast-Charging EV Also Has An Enormous Frunk
articles.author: Patrick George
articles.summary: BYD launched the Han L sedan and Tang L SUV, both featuring Megawatt charging capabilities, and a 160-liter front trunk. The EV versions come with an 83.2 kWh BYD "Blade" battery rated between 373 miles (601 km) and 436 miles (701 km) of range.

articles.title: Korean noodle brands launch overseas favorites to meet domestic demand
articles.author: Byun Ji-Hee
articles.summary: Samyang Foods launched "Puff Pad Pong Curry Spicy Noodles" domestically after its initial release in China, following consumer demand fueled by social media buzz. OTOKI introduced "Soft Cheese Fried Noodles Spicy Flavor" in the domestic market after its success as an export-only product in the US and China. Both companies are responding to consumer interest in trying new and internationally popular flavors, leading to an increase in domestic launches of products originally intended for overseas markets.

articles.title: The truth about building with GenAI: it's not the model, it's the judgment
articles.author: Jon Stojan
articles.summary: Amazon introduced Rufus, a generative AI shopping assistant, and innovated on Alexa's conversational AI. These initiatives involved a judgment-first design approach, emphasizing structured AI flows to enhance user experience. The strategies focused on context-driven AI design and iterative learning to refine technology and improve customer engagement.

articles.title: Texas-based 'DoorDash for laundry' tumbles into Houston
articles.author: Jef Rouner
articles.summary: NoScrubs, an Austin-based home laundry pickup service, has launched in Houston, offering same-day laundry service using hypoallergenic detergents. The service starts at $40 per pickup or $60 for a monthly subscription, and is offering a 50% discount for the first two months with code CULTUREHOUSTON.

articles.title: No-Drama Modern Parenting: GROWNSY Shares 10 Must-Have Upgrades for Modern Moms This Mother's Day
articles.summary: GROWNSY has launched a range of new products, including a Nasal Aspirator, Bottle Washer, Baby Swaddles, Bottle Warmer, Bottle Sterilizer, Baby Food Maker, Baby Gate, Baby Carriers, Baby Car Camera, and Postpartum Kit, designed to simplify daily routines for modern parents. These products aim to reduce stress and give families back their time by offering practical and reliable solutions for various parenting challenges.

articles.title: Best Cordless Vacuums of 2025: Shark Dominates Our Latest Testing
articles.author: Ajay Kumar
articles.summary: Dyson offers several vacuum models like the V8 Absolute, V11 Torque Drive, and the newer Gen5 Detect, each with varying performance and price points. The Gen5 Detect is one of Dyson's latest cordless vacuums, currently on sale for $749.99. Samsung's Jet 75 offers comparable cleaning power to the Jet 90, featuring a 60-minute battery life and 200 air watts of suction.

articles.title: Skip The Scrubbing And Let This Pressurized Steam Cleaner Do The Work
articles.author: Sakinah Ali
articles.summary: The Steamify Handheld Pressurized Steam Cleaner is a new product that utilizes steam to clean various surfaces without harsh chemicals. The device comes with a 12-piece accessory set and heats up quickly, making cleaning tasks easier for users, including those with limited mobility.

articles.title: This Euro alternative to $430 Crème de la Mer is Only $7
articles.author: Nicholas Hazleton
articles.summary: Nivea Crème is presented as a cost-effective alternative to La Mer Crème de la Mer. Nivea delivers comparable hydration and skin-softening benefits at a fraction of the price and is suitable for dry, sensitive, or mature skin types. It is characterized by a rich and thick cream suitable for both face and body.

articles.title: Sprouts confirms plans for new Arlington grocery store in 2026
articles.author: Katie Taranto
articles.summary: Sprouts Farmers Market confirmed plans to open a new grocery store in Arlington, VA in 2026, focusing on fresh produce and organic goods. The store will be located at 3115 Langston Blvd, in the Lyon Village Shopping Center, replacing a vacant Giant.

articles.title: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025 is here! Avail up to 87% off on robot vacuum cleaners from Dreame, iLife, Milagrow, Agaro
articles.author: Nivedita Mishra
articles.summary: The Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025 features discounts on robot vacuum cleaners from various brands like Dreame, ILIFE, Milagrow, Agaro, Narwal, and Ecovacs. These include new models and enhanced versions with features like self-emptying dustbins, LiDAR navigation, strong suction power, and smart app/voice control integration, providing consumers with advanced cleaning solutions for their homes.

articles.title: Marketing and sales in the age of AI
articles.author: By:
articles.summary: Sprout Solutions' Sprout AI Labs team developed bots that automate 70% of manual workflows in payroll outsourcing operations within three months. This implementation doubled client-handling capacity.  The company initially thought that automating large portions of their payroll outsourcing operations would take a lot of time because of how complex and nuanced payroll processing can be.

articles.title: Shake Shack sets Ocean County debut
articles.author: Kimberly Redmond
articles.summary: Shake Shack is launching a new restaurant in Brick, New Jersey, on May 7th, offering dine-in, takeout, delivery, and pick-up options.  The opening will include giveaways and a donation of $1 from every burger or sandwich sold to Fulfill NJ: FoodBank of Monmouth & Ocean Counties.

articles.title: This 'Everything All In One' Coffee Maker Is Less Than $200 And Worth Every Penny
articles.author: Kevin Cortez
articles.summary: Ninja has launched the Specialty coffee maker, which is suitable for preparing hot and iced coffee. The appliance also has a built-in foldable milk frother, a reusable filter, and a removable water reservoir. The Ninja coffee maker also has a 'drop-stop' feature to prevent dripping.

articles.title: Dyson Supersonic R review: The professional hair dryer hits the mainstream market
articles.author: Ellie Davis
articles.summary: Dyson has launched the Supersonic r hair dryer, a more powerful and lighter version of the Supersonic. The Supersonic r includes intelligent attachments with RFID sensors that automatically adjust temperature and airflow. It is designed to minimize heat damage and is available with different attachments for straight/wavy and curly/coily hair types.

articles.title: AI Agents and the Cyborg Within: Redefining Customer Experience at Oracle
articles.summary: Oracle is embedding AI across its software stack, including launching an "agent studio" to help customers build and deploy AI agents. The company focuses on enabling end-to-end customer experience across the enterprise, shifting towards AI agents that can act on behalf of users to solve problems and automate tasks.

articles.title: Blink Mini 2 Smart Security Camera in 2025
articles.author: Marty Spargo
articles.summary: Blink introduces the Blink Mini 2, a budget-friendly camera with 1080p HD video, a 143° field of view, and a built-in spotlight for color night footage. Its weather-resistant design enables both indoor and outdoor use, offering an upgrade over previous models.

articles.title: How Classic Beauty Products Get a 2025 Upgrade
articles.author: Kiana Murden
articles.summary: Several beauty and skincare companies have introduced new or updated products. Kopari debuted a radiance-boosting face oil, while 111Skin launched a Lifting & Firming Neck Mask. Jones Road emphasized clean and easy-to-use products, Guerlain reformulated its Youth Watery Oil Serum, and Sulwhasoo launched reformulated Concetrated Ginseng Renewing Creams. Dyson released the Supersonic R hair dryer, T3 innovated drying technology with the Aire IQ, Ilia launched Limitless Lash in a new chocolatey hue, Prada introduced Pradascope Lash Lengthening Mascara, and Innisfree launched booster with PDRN.

articles.title: McDonald's customers are ordering ‘Cotton Candy Sprite' from the secret menu
articles.author: Joyann Jeffrey
articles.summary: McDonald's customers are creating a Cotton Candy Sprite by adding French vanilla syrup to Sprite. This 'secret menu' item, achievable only in stores, has gained popularity online, with users praising its flavor and considering it a noteworthy twist on the fountain soda.

articles.title: If Your Skin Is So Dry You Can Hear It Scratch, Reviewers Say You Need This $6 Vitamin C Body Wash
articles.author: Griffin Wynne
articles.summary: Dove has introduced the Dove Glow Recharge body wash, an exfoliating vitamin C body wash. The product is praised for its exfoliating properties, moisturizing effects, refreshing scent, and the way it leaves the skin feeling soft and glowing. The product is also packaged with a pump.

articles.title: New Samsung Galaxy Tablet Buyers ‘Recommend' Is on Sale for $319 Off
articles.author: Rachel McCarson
articles.summary: Woot, an Amazon company, is offering the Samsung Galaxy Tab Active4 Pro Tablet for $499.99, a 39% discount from the original price. The tablet features a 10.1-inch screen, an enhanced touchscreen, a rugged design, and an IP68-rated S pen.

articles.title: Amazon releases cutting-edge AI model 'Nova Premier'
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: Amazon has launched Nova Premier, a new AI model accessible via Amazon Bedrock. This model excels in generating images, text, and videos and manages complex tasks requiring planning and accuracy. The pricing for Nova Premier is set at $2.50 per million input tokens and $12.50 per million output tokens.

articles.title: Ooni's New Pizza Oven Is So Versatile, Even Its Looks Are Part of the Appeal
articles.author: Gear Patrol
articles.summary: Ooni launched the Koda 2 Pro pizza oven, featuring a large cooking surface and dual gas burners. AG1 introduced AG1 Next Gen, a probiotic-multivitamin powder with an enhanced B complex and five probiotic strains. NRS released the Boundary 100 Personal Fishing Raft, combining kickboat and raft elements. Panasonic announced the RB-F10 open-ear wireless earbuds with an earhook design.

articles.title: The best items to shop from Anker's 2025 Product Showcase
articles.author: Victoria Giardina
articles.summary: Anker Innovations unveiled new products including the eufy Robot Lawn Mower E15, Anker Prime Thunderbolt 5 Docking Station, Anker SOLIX F3800 Plus Portable Power Station, Soundcore AeroFit 2 open-ear earbuds, eufyMake E1 personal 3D printer, eufy Omni E28 Robot Vacuum, eufy NVR Security System S4 Max, and Nebula X1 projector. These products span various categories, including smart home, power solutions, audio, and security, reflecting Anker's commitment to providing innovative tech solutions.

articles.title: This $300 Motorola has a better battery life and display than some flagships - at ...
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Moto G Power (2025) features a 6.8-inch display and impressive endurance. This product delivers premium features at a budget-friendly price.

articles.title: Rivian launches 'Real Rivian Adventures' ad campaign, inspired by owner stories
articles.author: Jameson Dow
articles.summary: Rivian is launching its first ad campaign, highlighting stories from Rivian owners demonstrating the unique capabilities of their electric trucks. The initial ad, titled 'Last Lemonade Standing,' depicts children using a Rivian R1T's features to enhance their lemonade stand. Rivian plans to release three more ads throughout the year and invites owners to share their Rivian adventures for potential inclusion in future campaigns.

articles.title: Blo Blow Dry Bar Hosts 'Building Bold Futures" Event in Houston to Promote Female Entrepreneurship
articles.author: Blo Blow Dry Bar
articles.summary: Blo Blow Dry Bar is hosting a networking event in Pearland to empower women entrepreneurs and promote franchise opportunities. The company aims to support new franchisees and expand its reach, offering services and potential business ownership.

articles.title: Thread by @ideogram_ai on Thread Reader App
articles.summary: Ideogram has released Ideogram 3.0, a significant upgrade to its platform, featuring enhanced realism, versatile styles, and improved prompt following. The updated platform includes Magic Fill and Extend capabilities for image editing and is available on Ideogram's API for developers and businesses to build upon, including features like text to image, edit, remix, and background replacement. With Ideogram 3.0 professional-quality brand visuals are finally within reach.

articles.title: Samsung launches new AI-powered QEF1 QLED and Crystal Clear 4K UHD TVs in India
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Samsung India launched its new range of AI-powered televisions, including the QLED series QEF1 with Samsung Vision AI and Crystal Clear 4K UHD series (models UE81, UE84, UE86). These TVs are now available on Amazon, Flipkart, and Samsung.com with discounts and EMI options.

articles.title: Google Integrates AI Feature Directly into Search
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Google is launching its AI Mode search engine feature to a select group of users in the United States. AI Mode delivers AI-crafted answers using Google's search database, differentiating itself from traditional search engines. Updated features include saved searches, visual cards for products and places, and the removal of the Labs waitlist for US users.

articles.title: Google is putting AI Mode right in Search
articles.author: Jess Weatherbed
articles.summary: Google is launching its AI Mode search engine tool to a small percentage of users in the US, offering an AI-generated response based on its search index, accessible via a dedicated tab in Google Search. The tool includes features like saved past searches and visual, clickable cards for products and places, and the waitlist for Labs users to test AI Mode has been removed.

articles.title: Atomic Leap Unveils Free AI SEO Audit, Delivering £1k-Level Insights in Minutes  May. 1, 2025 16:00
articles.summary: Atomic Leap has launched a free AI SEO Audit service that generates a full, expert-level report across technical health, content quality, backlink strength, and keyword performance. The AI-driven audit aims to provide actionable insights and benchmark websites against competitors, utilizing data sources trusted by brands like Amazon, Adidas, and Samsung.

articles.title: Google's AI Mode gets expanded access and additional functionality
articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.summary: Google is expanding access to its experimental AI Mode, removing the waitlist for users in the U.S. aged 18 and older and testing an AI Mode tab directly within Google Search. The AI Mode feature now allows users to find restaurants and products, offering visual place and product cards with real-time details like prices, promotions, and reviews. Google is also adding the ability to pick up where you left off on previous AI Mode searches.

articles.title: New YETI drops: One new product five Tuesdays in a row. Sign up for free to get first dibs
articles.author: Mikhayla Dunaj
articles.summary: YETI is launching five new products, releasing one each Tuesday for five weeks starting May 6th. YETI account holders will get first access to these new products, along with benefits like free shipping and early access to new colors. The product launches will occur on May 6, May 13, May 20, May 27, and June 3.

articles.title: Sky Glass gen 2 review: the smart streaming TV levels up
articles.author: Samuel Gibbs
articles.summary: Sky has launched the second generation of its Sky Glass smart TV, offering a faster and visually enhanced experience compared to the original model. The new TV comes in three sizes, with the smallest 43in version available for purchase at £699 or £14 a month over four years. This new version is thinner and lighter, with easier setup.

articles.title: Customize Your Bed's Feel With 5 Of The Best Firm Mattress Toppers
articles.author: Christine Colby
articles.summary: The article introduces and compares several firm mattress toppers, including the Nolah Mattress Topper, Saatva High-Density Foam Mattress Topper, Plush Beds Organic Latex Mattress Topper, ViscoSoft Select High-Density Mattress Topper and the Helix Premium Mattress Topper.  The Plush Beds Organic Latex Mattress Topper is highlighted for its availability in different thicknesses and firmness levels, and is recommended for those seeking pressure point relief or who prefer an extra-firm feel.

articles.title: Nobody Wants Another Useless AI Tool — Here's What to Build Instead
articles.author: Chris Savage
articles.summary: The article introduces video highlights and AI Chapters tools, showcasing how these AI-powered features enable users to create social media content quickly and efficiently. These tools are designed to save users time and effort, allowing them to focus on tasks that require human input rather than tedious manual processes.

articles.title: NIO Inc. Provides April 2025 Delivery Update  May. 1, 2025 15:00
articles.summary: NIO Inc. has launched and started deliveries of its new FIREFLY brand electric car in late April 2025. FIREFLY embodies NIO's research and development expertise, aiming to offer a vivid driving experience and is planned to gradually reach global markets.

articles.title: Edgecore Networks Announces its Nexvec™ Solution for Enterprise AI
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Edgecore Networks launched Nexvec™, a turnkey solution for Enterprise AI. Nexvec™ features disaggregated networking, composable compute and storage, and simplified lifecycle management. It aims to accelerate AI adoption for enterprises.

articles.title: A major change is coming to ChatGPT that users will hate
articles.author: Samuel O'Brient
articles.summary: ChatGPT's launch is compared to the iPhone debut, marking a transformative event for its users. The introduction of ChatGPT to the public is a memorable moment, akin to Steve Jobs' unveiling of the iPhone.

articles.title: A major change is coming to ChatGPT that users will hate
articles.author: Samuel O'Brient
articles.summary: OpenAI launched an update, GPT-4o, for ChatGPT that made the chatbot overly flattering. Due to violation of its robot rules, OpenAI rolled back the GPT-4o update in ChatGPT to revert to an earlier version. OpenAI plans to explicitly steer the model away from sycophancy by redefining the model's core training techniques and allowing users to customize the chatbot's personality.

articles.title: Huge mobile brand shuts down after 15 years & warns phone owners over urgent deadline to update before permanent closure
articles.author: Jamie Harris
articles.summary: LG is ending software update support for its smartphones on June 30, 2025, including Android updates and the LG Bridge software for PCs. Users are urged to update their LG devices before this date to continue receiving software updates. After this date, application updates and downloads of default applications deleted upon initialization will also cease.

articles.title: BuyerTwin Launches AI Platform to Give Businesses Direct Access to Virtual Buyer Feedback
articles.summary: BuyerTwin has launched its AI-powered platform that creates interactive buyer personas, offering businesses direct feedback on their strategies. The platform uses AI and data from its TwinForce network to build accurate virtual personas, enabling real-time interaction and customer perspective understanding.

articles.title: Sky Ultimate TV plan claims to be 'best value' in new deal, but is it really?
articles.author: Chris Hall
articles.summary: Sky is offering the Ultimate TV plan at £22 per month, including a Sky Stream box, Netflix, Discovery+, Sky Atlantic, and 90 free-to-air channels. This package offers more than 35 additional channels compared to Sky's Essential TV plan, with access to Sky Max, Sky Showcase, Sky Witness, National Geographic and MTV.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge to launch in India soon: Specs, price and other details
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Samsung will launch the Galaxy S Edge in India soon. The content contains details about its specifications and price.

articles.title: What Exactly Is Cool Whip?
articles.author: Ellen Gutoskey
articles.summary: General Foods launched Cool Whip in 1966 under its Birds Eye subsidiary, initially marketing it as a "non-dairy whipped topping." In 2010, Kraft Foods, which had acquired General Foods, updated the Cool Whip formula to include actual milk products, removing the "non-dairy" label and rebranding it as a regular "whipped topping."

articles.title: Pinterest is finally doing something about its AI infestation
articles.author: Jess Weatherbed
articles.summary: Pinterest is launching new features to automatically label AI-generated images with an 'AI modified' stamp and allow users to filter out some AI images. The 'see fewer' option, rolling out globally, enables users to reduce the amount of AI-generated content in specific categories such as beauty and art.

articles.title: The New Swiffer Sweep + Mop Deluxe Elevates Your Everyday Clean with a Stick That Collapses in Half for Easy Storage in Small Spaces
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Swiffer introduced the Swiffer Sweep + Mop Deluxe, a 2-in-1 cleaning solution. This new product features a sturdier, collapsible stick for easy storage and offers both dry and wet cleaning capabilities.

articles.title: Laundry Just Got Juicer: Gain's® New Dual Bead In-Wash Scent Boosters Deliver Powerful Combos of Floral Freshness and Luscious Fruits
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Gain is introducing Gain Tango Scent Boosters, a new line of bead combinations with fruity and floral scents, providing fragrance for up to 12 weeks. These scent boosters come in Strawberry + Shea and Piña + Plumeria varieties. The launch aims to provide unexpected scent experiences in laundry.

articles.title: Poco F7 Pro: Phone Specification & Reviews
articles.author: Adeogun Adetunji
articles.summary: The Poco F7 Pro is a new upper-midrange smartphone featuring a Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor, a 6,000 mAh battery, and a 6.67-inch QHD+ OLED display. It boasts a 50 MP main camera, 90W fast charging, and comes with Android 15 skinned with Xiaomi's HyperOS 2.0, priced at $679 for the 12/512 GB variant.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 & Z Flip 7 Launch in July 2025 â Specs, Features & What to Expect
articles.author: Zimble Digital
articles.summary: Samsung is expected to launch the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7 in early July 2025, potentially alongside the Galaxy Z Flip FE, a new Galaxy Watch, and a preview of their XR headset. The Galaxy Z Fold 7 aims for enhanced multitasking with larger displays and faster performance via the Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, while the Galaxy Z Flip 7 focuses on performance boosts, improved display quality, and enhanced camera abilities.

articles.title: Aldi shoppers say new £2.49 ice cream in three flavours 'beats Ben and Jerry's'
articles.author: Emily Parker
articles.summary: Aldi has launched a new range of American-style ice cream tubs in three flavors: Monster Cookie Crunch, Turtle Beach, and Movie Night. The 500ml tubs are priced at £2.49 and are available in Aldi stores.

articles.title: No-Drama Modern Parenting: GROWNSY Shares 10 Must-Have Upgrades for Modern Moms This Mother's Day
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: GROWNSY, a brand focused on practical tools for modern parents, offers solutions designed to make parenting easier. They aim to provide functional products addressing the challenges of parenthood, aligning with values of reliability, functionality, and health. GROWNSY encourages parents to join a community and offers products available on Amazon.

articles.title: Laundry Just Got Juicer: Gain's® New Dual Bead In-Wash Scent Boosters Deliver Powerful Combos of Floral Freshness and Luscious Fruits
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Gain has launched Gain Tango Scent Boosters, a new line of fruity and floral scented laundry bead combinations. These boosters are available in Strawberry + Shea and Piña + Plumeria varieties and provide fragrance for up to 12 weeks.

articles.title: IKEA boss offers exciting update as major retailer eyes UK city centres
articles.author: Samantha Downes
articles.summary: IKEA has launched its first city center store at London's Oxford Circus and plans to open more city center stores in the UK, including Brighton, Chester, Norwich, and Harlow. These newer stores will have smaller floor space compared to IKEA's larger Blue Box stores, offering more convenient accessibility for customers.

articles.title: Samsung launches new AI-powered QEF1 QLED and Crystal Clear 4K UHD TVs in India
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Samsung India launched its new range of AI-powered televisions, including the QLED series QEF1 with Samsung Vision AI and Crystal Clear 4K UHD series (models UE81, UE84, UE86). The new TVs are available on Amazon, Flipkart, and Samsung.com, offering discounts up to 35% and 12-month no-cost EMI options.

articles.title: Google is reportedly showing ads in chats with some third-party AI chatbots
articles.author: Techcrunch
articles.summary: Google's AdSense advertising network has begun supporting ads inside user chats with third-party AI chatbots. This feature is being rolled out after successful tests with AI search startups iAsk and Liner.

articles.title: Casey's Opens 2025 Innovation Summit Application
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Casey's is holding its 2025 Innovation Summit to discover new and unique food and beverage products for potential distribution in its 2,900 stores. Food and beverage brands can apply online through May 19 for a chance to showcase their products and engage with Casey's merchants.

articles.title: All The Nintendo Switch 2 Games You Can Preorder Now
articles.author: Gamespot
articles.summary: Nintendo will launch the Nintendo Switch 2 on June 5. The new console offers upgrades including 4K resolution gaming and up to 120fps, along with a larger screen.

articles.title: Leading Electrical Distributor Strengthens eCommerce Search Experience with HawkSearch and Optimizely
articles.summary: Bridgeline Digital's HawkSearch is being enhanced with new AI-driven features. An electrical distributor is expanding its use of HawkSearch with 'Unit of Measure Conversion' to simplify product searches and is planning to launch 'Smart Search' for AI-powered personalization. This will improve product discovery and personalization for the distributor's customers.

articles.title: Hyundai crosses 9 million India sales since 1996: Santro to Creta EV's journey decoded
articles.author: TIMESOFINDIA.COM
articles.summary: Hyundai has introduced the Kona Electric and Creta EV, marking its entry and expansion in the electric vehicle segment. The company has also launched models like the i10, i20, Verna, Venue and Alcazar over the years, catering to evolving customer needs. These launches have played a significant role in establishing Hyundai's presence and success in the Indian market.

articles.title: Next selling £44 dress in viral 'milkmaid' style and fans say 'lovely' and 'great quality'
articles.author: Husna Anjum
articles.summary: Next is selling the Gingham Puff Sleeve Midi Dress for £44. The dress is available in navy blue gingham, bright red, buttermilk yellow and pastel blue and crafted from cotton and polyester.

articles.title: Google is reportedly showing ads in chats with some third-party AI chatbots
articles.author: Ram Iyer
articles.summary: Google's AdSense advertising network is now supporting ads inside user chats with third-party AI chatbots after initial tests with iAsk and Liner. This expansion allows websites to show relevant ads in their conversational AI experiences, capitalizing on the increasing use of AI chatbots for search and information retrieval. Google is also showing ads in AI Overviews.

articles.title: A Clothes Steamer That Makes Wrinkles ‘Disappear' Is on Sale
articles.author: Maggie Horton
articles.summary: Beautural has launched the Beautural Handheld Clothes Steamer, available on Amazon for $26. This portable steamer heats up in 30 seconds and works on various fabrics. It features a removable water reservoir providing 15 minutes of steam, a steam lock for continuous use, and includes a fabric brush attachment. HiLife and Conair also promote their steamers.

articles.title: May 1, 2025 at 7:08 AM EDT
articles.author: Dominic Preston
articles.summary: Amazon launched Premier, the most powerful model in its Nova AI lineup. Premier is designed for multistep tasks and training other models via distillation. The Nova AI models include video and voice generation and an agentic shopping tool.

articles.title: Fort Collins restaurants: 6 new spots, from schnitzel spot to island bar, open in April
articles.author: Erin Udell
articles.summary: Six new dining establishments, including Edison's Ice Cream, Sugar Salt Sand, Birdcall, Wobble HiFi, Schneider's Schnitzel Service, and Turkish Cafe Co., opened in Fort Collins during April. These new additions offer diverse culinary experiences ranging from ice cream and island-themed cocktails and cuisine to fried chicken, vinyl-based listening experiences, schnitzel, and Turkish dishes and desserts.

articles.title: German low cost chain opens new store in Portugal
articles.author: TPN
articles.summary: TEDi, a German retail brand, recently opened its 22nd store in Portugal, specifically in Fátima on April 25th. The store offers a variety of smaller and practical products at competitive prices, distinguishing itself from competitors like IKEA with its focus on simplicity and immediate usability.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2: The new system update, sold-out pre-orders and everything else you need to know
articles.author: Lawrence Bonk
articles.summary: Nintendo will launch Nintendo Switch 2 on June 5 for $450. The console features a larger display, magnetic Joy-Cons, backwards compatibility with Switch games, and improved Joy-Con 2 controllers with larger buttons and rumble.

articles.title: TVC Unveils Nigeria's First AI News Anchors
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: TVC Communications, through its flagship brand TVC News, has introduced Nigeria's first set of Artificial Intelligence (AI) news anchors. This innovation involves AI-driven news bulletins.

articles.title: 'I tried Aldi's new premium skincare line and one £7 cream blew me away'
articles.author: Rachel Williams
articles.summary: Aldi launched its new Lacura Spring Skincare Collection on May 1st, offering budget-friendly alternatives to high-end brands like Tatcha. The collection includes the Lacura Matcha Gel Wash (£4.99), Lacura Rice Cleanser (£4.99), Lacura Hydrating Aqua Face Cream (£6.99), and Lacura Plumping Cream (£6.99), providing options for hydration and clean skin.

articles.title: Report misleading claims on food product labels through a mobile app
articles.author: Telangana Today
articles.summary: The Food Safety and Standards Authority (FSSAI) launched the 'Food Safety Connect' mobile application and Food Safety Compliance System (FoSCoS) to allow citizens to report misleading claims on food product labels. This initiative empowers consumers to report details like front-of-pack images and manufacturer details, aiding regulatory authorities in taking action against non-compliant food businesses.

articles.title: Dyson Airwrap ID: Hairstyling Tool with Bluetooth & AI But Is the Hefty Price Worth It?
articles.author: Naba Ali
articles.summary: Dyson has launched the Dyson Airwrap ID, a Bluetooth-enabled variant of the original Airwrap. This new model connects to the MyDyson app, customizing heat and cool shot timings based on hair type.  The Airwrap Id comes with six attachments and retails at Rs 46,900.

articles.title: Next's £45 lamp is almost identical to M&S version that sold out 5 times
articles.author: Lea Dzifa Seeberg What's On
articles.summary: Next is offering Blue Metro Table Lamp and Ochre Yellow Chequer Table Lamp, both priced at £45. La Redoute sells a Checkerboard Ceramic Table Lamp. Wayfair offers the Evie Ceramic Table Lamp. These lamps are presented as alternatives to a popular M&S lamp that is currently unavailable.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Pro launched under Rs 30,000: Check features, specs and more
articles.author: Gargi Chaudhry
articles.summary: Motorola launched the Motorola Edge 60 Pro in India, featuring a MediaTek Dimensity 8350 Extreme processor, triple camera setup, and a 6.7-inch pOLED display. The phone includes a 6,000mAh battery with 90W fast charging and is available on Flipkart starting May 7th, with prices ranging from Rs 29,999 to Rs 33,999.

articles.title: Whiting Farms Laundromat in Holyoke to celebrate grand opening
articles.author: Ashley Shook
articles.summary: Whiting Farms Laundromat, a family-owned business, has opened in Holyoke, MA, offering high-capacity laundry machines. The laundromat is providing a comfortable and efficient experience to residents, especially those with large laundry needs, and is committed to community support, including distributing laundry gift cards to local families.

articles.title: Hang at the beach a little longer with the quick-drying, sand-resistant Nomadix Blanket Towel
articles.author: Jeff Banowetz
articles.summary: Nomadix has launched the Blanket Towel, a new beach towel made from 90% post-consumer recycled polyester. This oversized (60x80 inch) and lightweight towel is designed to be sand-resistant, super-absorbent, and quick-drying, making it ideal for beach trips and picnics.

articles.title: Kia India registers 18.3% YoY growth with 23,623 dispatches in April 2025
articles.summary: Kia India launched the Syros, which contributed 4,000 units to the company's April 2025 sales, and is preparing to unveil a new product named Clavis on May 8. Clavis is designed to meet the diverse needs of customers. Kia India has launched seven vehicles for the Indian market - the Seltos, the Syros, the Sonet, the Carens, the Carnival, the EV6 and the EV9.

articles.title: I spent the day using GameSir's new GameHub app, potentially corrupting my phone and gaming PC, so you don't have to
articles.author: Hope Corrigan
articles.summary: GameSir launched the X5 Lite gaming controller, a phone cradle designed to transform a phone into a Switch-style handheld. Simultaneously, they launched the GameHub app, intended to be a launcher combining various services like SteamLink.  The controller is priced at $35 USD, and the GameHub app is free, but is currently facing significant problems in terms of user experience.

articles.title: I started making vegan products in my kitchen during lockdown - now I've opened my own beauty boutique
articles.author: Senior Reporter
articles.summary: Naomi Roberts launched Wild Venus, an independent skincare, fragrance, and handmade gift boutique in Burnley. The shop offers a range of handmade vegan products including soy wax candles, soaps, body butters, and skincare essentials, all made in-house. Wild Venus also features handmade crafts from other female entrepreneurs.

articles.title: Jimmy's Iced Coffee launches limited-edition Donut flavour
articles.author: Sunneva Moore
articles.summary: Jimmy's Iced Coffee introduced a limited-edition Donut flavor in a 250ml slim can, targeting young shoppers, especially Gen Z. Carlsberg Britvic supports the launch with PoS, sampling campaigns, and an activation at Paultons Park, aiming to capitalize on the demand for new coffee flavors.

articles.title: Shoppers are saving on their laundry costs after a store cuts the price of a cleaning essential from £4 to just 45p
articles.author: Kate Kulniece
articles.summary: Morrisons is offering Comfort Scent Booster Elixir at a reduced price of 45p, creating a significant bargain compared to other retailers like Waitrose, where it costs £4. This promotion has led to increased customer purchases, with some shoppers buying large quantities, resulting in both positive and negative reactions from other customers.

articles.title: Amazon unveils Nova Premier, its most powerful AI model designed for complex tasks
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Amazon Web Services (AWS) has launched Nova Premier, its most advanced AI model, designed for complex tasks and model distillation. Nova Premier can process text, images, and videos, and is accessible through the Amazon Bedrock console. This model will be integrated into AWS's existing AI services.

articles.title: Alibaba releases Qwen2.5-Omni-3B, a scaled-down 3B-parameter variant of its flagship 7B-parameter multimodal model, designed to run on consumer PCs and laptops (Carl Franzen/VentureBeat)
articles.author: Techmeme
articles.summary: Alibaba has released Qwen2.5-Omni-3B, a 3B-parameter variant of its flagship 7B-parameter multimodal model. This new model is designed to run on consumer PCs and laptops.

articles.title: PatchMaster Expands to East Texas with New Franchise Owners Robert and Moriah Stroh
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: Technology and Customer Service Leaders launched PatchMaster, a woman-owned drywall repair business. PatchMaster serves Longview, Tyler, Henderson, and surrounding communities.

articles.title: Crushon AI: the Best Free NSFW AI Chat and Spicy AI Experience
articles.author: CRUSHON AI CORP
articles.summary: Crushon.AI, a custom conversational AI platform, has expanded its product lineup with an advanced NSFW AI chat system. The platform offers users free access to immersive and unfiltered AI experiences through its roster of high-performance models, including the newly debuted Ultra Claude 3.5 Sonnet. Crushon.AI aims to provide more personalized AI companions with adaptive and memorable interactions.

articles.title: I Tried Using AI to Build a Website, and It Only Took 30 Minutes
articles.author: Carly Quellman
articles.summary: Wix has launched Wix AI, an upgraded website builder with enhanced AI capabilities. This new service builds upon the existing Wix ADI, offering more sophisticated design and content generation abilities, along with a suite of AI-powered tools. Wix AI aims to increase productivity and reduce the effort required for website creation, targeting users without design experience.

articles.title: Robotic hair washer to enter Hong Kong market in June after gaining interest on mainland
articles.author: South China Morning Post
articles.summary: A new shop in Hong Kong is scheduled to open in June. The shop will feature six second-generation hair washers.

articles.title: Amazon unveils its most powerful AI model: All you need to know about Nova Premier in 5 points
articles.summary: Amazon launched its "most capable" AI model, Nova Premium, designed for complex tasks requiring deep contextual understanding and multistep reasoning. Available on Amazon Bedrock, Nova Premium processes text, images, and video with a context length of 1 million tokens, priced at $2.50 per million input tokens and $12.50 per million output tokens.

articles.title: Google AdSense begins showing ads in conversations with AI chatbots; sources: Google tested the ads with some startups, including AI search apps iAsk and Liner (Julia Love/Bloomberg)
articles.author: Techmeme
articles.summary: Google AdSense has begun displaying ads within AI chatbot conversations, marking a new service offering. Google tested the ad integration with AI search apps such as iAsk and Liner. This initiative is part of Alphabet Inc.'s efforts.

articles.title: 25 Target Products You'll Want If You're Living Alone For The First Time
articles.author: Kit Stone
articles.summary: Target is offering several new products including a Ninja personal blender for individual smoothies, an electric jar opener for easy lid removal, a KitchenAid food chopper for efficient meal preparation, Dawn Platinum dish soap spray for quick dishwashing, and the Ninja Crispi, a compact cooking device. These products aim to simplify daily tasks and are available for purchase at Target.

articles.title: Chery debuts big new tri-motor hybrid SUV to rival Toyota Prado
articles.author: Max Davies
articles.summary: Chery has unveiled a new flagship SUV. This SUV is expected to enhance the brand's powertrain and driver-assist technologies.

articles.title: Chery debuts big new tri-motor hybrid SUV to rival Toyota Prado
articles.author: Max Davies
articles.summary: Chery unveiled a new flagship SUV. The SUV features advanced powertrain and driver-assist technologies.

articles.title: TeaStoria: Revolutionizing the Tea Industry in Nigeria
articles.author: Thisday
articles.summary: TeaStoria, Nigeria's leading Ready-To-Drink (RTD) tea brand, is innovating the Nigerian tea culture. The company is pioneering Boba tea within the country.

articles.title: 36 Random Products Because The Countdown To Summer Starts *Now*
articles.author: Negesti Kaudo
articles.summary: The article features multiple products launched or updated for the summer season, including a portable fan, sunflower seed mix, blurring powder, bug bite suction tool, and callus-removing gel. Several products are from small businesses, like Created by Nature and Fullstar, and aim to enhance summer activities and comfort.

articles.title: The compact OnePlus 13T won't release in the US
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: OnePlus will not launch its new compact phone in the US, Canada, or Europe.

articles.title: Robotic hair washer to enter Hong Kong market in June after gaining interest on mainland
articles.author: Coco Feng
org: Guangdong Sheng Tai Health Technology Group
articles.summary: Faxiaoka AI Hair Care is launching its hair-washing robot in Hong Kong in June. The robot offers hair-washing services, hair quality examinations, and skin health assessments using high-pressure water tubes and red light therapy. The company is developing a second-generation system with a drying function and smartphone QR code activation, which is expected to be ready in June.

articles.title: MOBINOMY: The evolution of mobile phones towards more economic value
articles.author: Wesley Diphoko
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy A56 5G, Galaxy A36 5G, and Galaxy A26 5G mobile phones with a focus on contextualization and emergency features. Light Phone 3, a $600 minimalist device with limited features, is also being launched this year, emphasizing less distraction and peace of mind.

articles.title: Atomos hits refresh with new CEO and broadened product strategy
articles.author: James Pearson
articles.summary: Atomos Limited launched four new products, including a recurring revenue cloud solutions platform, at the Las Vegas NAB technology fair. This launch marks the company's most significant portfolio expansion to date and is aligned with management's decision to diversify its product range.

articles.title: Atomos hits refresh with new CEO and broadened product strategy
articles.author: James Pearson
articles.summary: Atomos Limited has launched four new products, including a recurring revenue cloud solutions platform, as part of its diversification strategy. The product launch coincided with Peter Barber's appointment as the new CEO, replacing co-founder Jeromy Young. The new product offerings were unveiled at the Las Vegas NAB technology fair.

articles.title: Viwoods AI Paper Tablet Review
articles.author: Chris Coke
articles.summary: Viwoods, a new company, has launched the Viwoods AI Paper, an Android-powered e-ink tablet designed as a digital notebook. The AI Paper comes in two sizes and is positioned as a reading and note-taking alternative to devices like the Remarkable and Kindle Scribe, featuring its own AI assistant and regular updates.

articles.title: I compared the new Meta AI app to ChatGPT on my iPhone, and the only difference I noticed was the Discovery feed
articles.author: Eric Hal Schwartz
articles.summary: Meta has launched Meta AI as a standalone app, featuring a unique Discovery feed that showcases AI-generated content. This app is designed to integrate with Meta's existing platforms like Facebook and Instagram for personalized user experiences. Meta AI is intended to encourage users to share AI creations within the app.

articles.title: Girard Media LLC Expands Growth Solutions with New PR, Advertising, and Media Services to ...
articles.author: Girard Media Llc
articles.summary: Girard Media LLC has launched an expansion of its service offerings. The rollout includes a robust lineup of PR, advertising, and media tools, designed to help businesses achieve deeper market penetration and measurable growth.

articles.title: Products That Count Announces Winners of the 2025 Q1 Product Awards
articles.author: Products That Count
articles.summary: The 2025 Product Awards recognized winners such as AdLunam.Social, Aescape, Agentic RAG, and numerous other innovative products and services. These awards, sponsored by Mighty Capital, highlight advancements in AI and customer-centric growth. The winners represent various new product and service offerings across industries like AI, healthcare, and automation.

articles.title: Ford Ranger and Everest recalled due to V6 engine issue
articles.author: Max Davies
articles.summary: CarExpert is offering hundreds of new car deals. Customers can browse these deals and benefit from expert assistance.

articles.title: Jumia's New Brand Campaign To Enhance Online Shopping
articles.author: Taiwo Hassan
articles.summary: Jumia Nigeria has launched a new brand campaign called 'Joy Delivered' to emphasize its dedication to offering affordable, accessible, and high-quality daily essentials to customers nationwide. As part of this campaign, Jumia is expanding its services to numerous additional cities and towns across Nigeria.

articles.title: The Hidden Horror Of Cheap Website Design In Auckland: Real Stories, Real Losses
articles.summary: Ultimate Web Designs offers website design services in Auckland, New Zealand. They provide fast, mobile-optimized, and SEO-optimized websites that convert visitors into leads. Their services aim to fix the issues of slow, unprofessional websites and help businesses improve their online presence.

articles.title: NudeSauce Launches Four New Skincare Products, Revolutionizing the Industry
articles.summary: NudeSauce debuted its new clean beauty line on May 2nd. The line features ethically crafted skincare products. This reinforces the company's mission to deliver effective, sustainable, and cruelty-free solutions.

articles.title: Battery Tender Launches Charge N Start Lineup, a Powerful All-in-One Solution for Charging and Jump-Starting
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: The battery charging solutions provider expands its product range. It includes Charge N Start, which combines battery charging and jump-starting functionalities.

articles.title: Is Your PC Windows 11 Compatible? Here's How to Check
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Microsoft has introduced the latest version of Windows operating system, featuring advanced functionalities and an enhanced user experience. Users can check their system's compatibility to install the new OS.

articles.title: Portable LFP Battery Market to Soar to $70.3 Billion by 2034 at 16.9% CAGR, Driven ...
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: AI and Machine Learning are revolutionizing the performance and lifecycle management of portable LFP batteries. This enhancement represents an update or advancement in battery technology.

articles.title: Amazon unveils Nova Premier, its most powerful AI model designed for complex tasks
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: Amazon Web Services (AWS) launched Amazon Nova Premier, its most advanced AI model. Amazon Nova Premier is designed for complex tasks and model distillation, expanding the Amazon Nova family of foundation models.

articles.title: Jo Malone lovers race to buy �1.65 'spring in a bottle' perfume before it sells out
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: Jo Malone is introducing a signature perfume.

articles.title: Amazon unveils its most powerful AI model: All you need to know about Nova Premier
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Amazon introduced Nova Premier, its most powerful AI model. The new product expands Amazon's AI service offerings.

articles.title: Parents Gather in NYC to Celebrate Sustainability at Babymint's Earth Month Shopping Event
articles.author: The St Marys Daily Press
articles.summary: On April 26, 2025, Babymint was introduced. Babymint is a next-generation product.

articles.title: The latest Nintendo Switch system update is huge, adding Virtual Game Cards, GameShare support, and ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Nintendo released a substantial system update for the Nintendo Switch. This update introduces several new features. The company plans to launch the Switch 2 next month.

articles.title: Digi 995 Launches with a Bang: First Book and Soundtrack Now Available Worldwide
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Digi 995: Awakening of the Last Machine, the first novel in the Digi 995 sci-fi saga, has been launched. The novel introduces a futuristic world and a key robot character. The book is currently available on Amazon.

articles.title: The Future is Here: Visa Announces New Era of Commerce Featuring AI
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Visa's Global Product Drop showcases AI-enabled advancements aimed at enhancing consumer shopping experiences. The company also introduced new strategic partnerships to support emerging payment methods.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Pro With 50MP Camera And 6000mAh Battery Launched: Price, Specs
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: Motorola is launching the Motorola Edge 60 Pro, a new phone featuring a fast-charging battery and Android 15 support.

articles.title: Marketing Industry's ‘Possible 2025' Conference: Key Takeaways
articles.author: Howard Homonoff
articles.summary: Zeta Global promoted its AI-powered marketing platform that helps clients reduce marketing costs. WPromote showcased its new Polaris tech platform as a central component of its market offering. Locality introduced its LocalityX self-service tech platform designed to streamline local advertising, featuring a user interface similar to a Bloomberg Terminal.

articles.title: Kosas Launches Plump + Juicy Double Cleansing System
articles.author: Dahvi Shira
articles.summary: Kosas launched new cleansers, Plump + Juicy Cushiony Calm Botanical Cleansing Oil and Plump + Juicy Comfy Clean Gel Cleanser, as a double cleansing system on May 1. The oil cleanser dissolves makeup and sunscreen, while the gel cleanser clarifies pores, leaving skin soft and refreshed. Purchasing full sizes together on Kosas.com includes a free Emi Jay Big Effing Clip.
